podcastContent:
我07年4月份去河北柏林禅寺，那上面写着 “平常心是道”。注意，“平常心是道”，这是南泉禅师的话。我看了以后立马就不理解，心想做人就得有大丈夫气吞山河、唾江万里的雄心，“平常心是道” 怎么能让我平常心呢？我就觉得人要变得不平常。你看，我那个时候（2007 年）就是这个认知水平，满脑子都是 “要与众不同”。
当时我就问寺院的知客僧：“你们为什么写‘平常心’？我觉得人要变得不平常才对。” 那知客僧一看我这状态，就笑了笑，说：“给你本书看看，你要不要？” 他大概是懒得跟我多解释，知道我还不具备接受这个道理的状态。
他给了我一本寺院发的小册子，可这个事、这个 “平常心是道” 的念头，却把我给抓住了。我心里犯嘀咕：不对啊，佛教这么伟大，为什么会倡导 “平常心” 呢？这里面肯定有深意，但我就是想不通。
后来我又看了一本书，叫南怀瑾的《冷眼观世间》。我入佛、学佛的门，就是从这本书开始的。一看之下，我直接就钻进去了。那一天晚上我都忘了自己休息没休息，心里完全被这本书抓住了，只顾着一直读。
我本身是学哲学的，学过西方哲学、马克思主义哲学，都讲究逻辑。所以我告诉你，学哲学的人要轻易迷信，那是很难的。但我读

analysis.contentEssence: 从“要与众不同”的躁动心，转向以《楞严经》为钥匙进入“常住真心”的门内，从此用更清明的尺度衡量一切学问。
analysis.physicalMetaphor: 一个人举着一把冷光手术刀，在一扇半掩的门前找到门闩的机关，轻轻一拨门开，门内的结构在光下层层显影。
analysis.metaphorVisualization: 画面以“门洞/阈限”为中心形体：厚重的门框形成明确边界；一束窄光从门缝溢出；门前有一把细长锐利的刃形（解剖刀）指向门闩位置；门内不是具体房间，而是由几层逐渐清晰的几何线框/网格递进，象征“打开后处处看得清”。

tension.from: 追求不平常的雄心与不理解“平常心是道”的抗拒
tension.to: 看见“门”并进入后获得可解剖、可辨析的清晰尺度

topologicalLayout.zoneCountReason: 意象包含“门前（迷与躁动）—门缝/门槛（关键机关）—门内（清晰显影）”三个连续阶段，必须用三段空间呈现“入门”的过程。
topologicalLayout.divisionMethodReason: 用斜向的门缝光束把空间切成“外→阈→内”的动线，强调‘找到机关并推开’的动作方向，而不是并列对照。

primaryRelationship.typeReason: 核心动作是“以钥匙般的理解（刀尖/刃形）刺入门闩点位，突破阈限让门内显影”，属于明确的穿透与开启。

rhythmSignature.typeReason: 从读书被抓住→逻辑如铁→门被打开→屋内处处看清，是认知快速推进、清晰度递增的节律。

structureParams.tensionExpression: 用“厚重门框的暗面”压住门外留白，再用“窄缝冷光”把注意力钉在门闩点位；门内以更密、更清的线框层层展开，形成从模糊到明晰的强烈推进张力。

antiTemplateCheck.howIsThisDifferent: 结构不是把两种观点并排对比，而是以“门槛—开门—显影”的单一核心动作组织三段纵深过程；张力来自阈限被突破与清晰度递增，而非左右对照。

prompt:
[CANVAS]
- Format: 1:1 square, 1024x1024 pixels
- Safe margin: 10% padding on all sides (no element touches the edge)
- Whitespace target: 65% (large calm empty fields, Ma)
- Visual weight distribution: left zone carries a single heavy dark mass (door-frame shadow) to compress the outside; the thinnest middle diagonal zone concentrates attention at one latch point; right zone is lighter overall but contains fine internal structure.

[TOPOLOGY] — based on topologicalLayout
- Zone count: 3
- Division method: diagonal progression (outside → threshold → inside), not left-right symmetry
- Zone ratios: 40:15:45 along the diagonal path
- Physical metaphor visualization: the center zone is a narrow diagonal “door slit / threshold band” that feels like a half-open door; it is the hinge of the narrative from agitation to clarity.

[RELATIONSHIPS] — based on primaryRelationship
- Primary relationship type: piercing
- Interaction quality: touching
- Spatial expression: a small blade-like wedge (surgical scalpel tip abstraction) enters and touches a tiny latch node located on the diagonal threshold band. The wedge must visibly pierce into the threshold band by a few pixels, implying a precise unlock.

[RHYTHM] — based on rhythmSignature
- Rhythm type: accelerating
- Element count: 4
- Interval/size variation: inside the right zone, place 4 thin wireframe “reveal planes” (rectilinear frames or partial frames) that become closer together (decreasing gaps) and slightly more defined (increasing line opacity) as they go deeper inward, creating a fast cognitive ramp-up.

[GEOMETRY]
- Primary shape (1): a thick, cropped rectangular block suggesting the door-frame shadow, placed in the left/outside zone, slightly off-center, matte, with sharp edges.
- Secondary shape (2): a narrow diagonal band (the door crack/threshold), running from upper-left toward lower-right, kept thin and controlled; contains one tiny circular/rounded latch node.
- Secondary shape (3): a small triangular blade wedge aligned toward the latch node; it overlaps the diagonal band minimally to indicate piercing.
- Lines (≤2): use only two line weights total for all interior wireframes; keep them hairline and consistent.
- Edge treatment: sharp overall, but apply soft-division micro-feather (very subtle) only at the boundary between zones to avoid harsh clichés.
- Negative space: preserve broad empty fields especially in upper-left and lower-right corners.

[COLOR]
- Background: cool-mist (#F5F7FA)
- Primary hue: moon-white (#F0F4F8) for main forms and interior reveals
- Temperature: cool, lucid (slightly sterile, awakening clarity) while remaining monochrome
- Contrast method: brightness only—use darker and lighter values of the same near-white/neutral family (no extra hues)
- Accent usage: none (no added accent colors); if any highlight is needed, do it as a lighter tint of moon-white with low opacity.

[LIGHTING]
- Light source: implied cold slit light emanating from the diagonal threshold band into the inside zone
- Glow effects: 1 total—very restrained glow hugging the diagonal slit near the latch point (low intensity, soft radius)
- Ambient atmosphere: quiet paper-white air, crisp and analytical.

[TEXTURE & MATERIAL]
- Surface quality: subtle paper-like matte grain across the whole canvas (very light)
- Edge sharpness: sharp baseline with slight feather at zone transitions only
- Transparency: use 3 depth levels via opacity (outside mass most opaque; threshold band medium; interior wireframes lightest).

[ATMOSPHERE & MOOD]
- Japanese aesthetic: Ma (dominant whitespace), Kanso (few elements), Shibui (restrained sophistication)
- Content resonance: a shocking but clean unlock—precision, calm certainty, and rational clarity increasing after the door yields.

[STYLE]
- Render style: clean vector-like digital art, high clarity at 128px thumbnail
- No photorealism, no 3D rendering, no text, no symbols, no UI elements.
